title: you cant balance olaf.
body: you can give him anything and beserker and he will solo carry no matter what lmfao.. but lets ignore it and keep buffing the only comps that win lmfao

replies.body: Your mistake is thinking that rito balances anything, if the last 5 seasons are any indication not only do they not balance anything, but they go out of their way to break champions. Want proof? Look at the last champions released. One more broken than the next. Senna the ADC support, Aphilios who basically 1 shot 2 people all game bottom lane until they "fixed" him. And my personal favorite Sett, who's entire kit is basically designed to 1v3.
Olaf is beatable, I play him with 6 berserker and hardly every come first. Yes, he has the ability to solo carry but wont necessarily guarantee a win.

I've run olaf a bunch, and he sure doesn't carry.. Even w/ good items, he's gotten blown up even before he ults..
I'll have to try the rfc route but most games, don't get enough recurves for that to be an option..

> [{quoted}](name=Ztoka,realm=NA,application-id=RaE1aOE7,discussion-id=cfU9FhL7,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2020-01-27T18:38:43.151+0000)
>
> I've run olaf a bunch, and he sure doesn't carry.. Even w/ good items, he's gotten blown up even before he ults..
> I'll have to try the rfc route but most games, don't get enough recurves for that to be an option..

If you double RFC him, he has the time to safely build his mana up without getting blown up by anything before he pops off.
Then once he activates his ability he's essentially a long range ADC that perma freezes the whole enemy team, without ever having to put himself in harms way.
You can acheive this same effect through Bersker spatulaing an Ezreal if you cant get the RFC's for Olaf.
Nice I have to try it.. Got the rfc's last game but no olaf.. haha.. Seriously the one game I haven't seen an olaf... QQ. Oh well :D

> you can give him anything and beserker and he will solo carry no matter what lmfao.. but lets ignore it and keep buffing the only comps that win lmfao

This shit is just shit - it is not a game anymore

He really requires very specific items to do any kind of carrying at all.
Otherwise youre better off itemizing Ezreal or something else.

If you cant get RFCx2+Guinsoo/Deathblade/IE/Silence or Disarm you seriously need to consider if you want to itemize your Olaf or not.
My policy with Olaf is...if i get 2x RFCs im definitely using Olaf as my Carry. If i only get 1 RFC, i will hold back on equipping anything until later on.
If i dont get any RFC's i dont even consider Olaf a viable carry.

RFCx2 = Go Olaf carry.
Pretty much anything else = go Ezreal carry.
